value.message: Function name 'getNPMPackageInfo' does not use a clear verb or verb-noun combination.
Access control error handling is not visible; exports may expose sensitive APIs without secure failure on errors.
value.suggestion: Ensure all exported APIs include secure error handling that denies access by default if access control checks fail or data is missing.

value.message: CRUD operations exported without explicit resource ownership checks; possible IDOR risk if backend relies on client-supplied IDs.
value.suggestion: Add backend resource ownership verification for all CRUD operations and avoid relying solely on client-supplied IDs for authorization.
value.codeSnippet: // Public coordination API (fact system implementation is private)

value.message: No allow list validation for dynamic URL redirects in exported APIs; risk of open redirect if user input is used.
value.suggestion: Implement allow list validation for all dynamic URL redirects and reject or warn if the URL is not permitted.
